Name: GNU
Kernel type: {{URL|https://www.gnu.org/software/hurd/faq/multiserver_microkernel.html|Multiserver Microkernel}} (Hurd kernel) or Monolithic (Linux-libre kernel, fork of Linux kernel, and other kernels which are not part of the GNU Project)
Oldest non-EOL version{{r|group=Note|a1}: 2.4 on Linux-libre kernel (no on Hurd kernel)

Name: RTEMS
Kernel programming language: C and ASM with native support for other languages including C++ and Ada
